Cryospheric Problem Solver¶

Built from elements of the [Var]iational [Gl]acier [S]imulator (VarGlaS) by Doug Brinkerhoff and the [U] of [M] [F]irn [D]ensification [M]odel (UM-FDM).

For the mathematical background, please read the thesis.
